thread.title: BT Sport to broadcast FIFA 17 Ultimate Team Championship | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: BT Sport to broadcast FIFA 17 Ultimate Team Championship | Daily Mail Online

author: Rory O'Callaghan For Mailonline
title: BT Sport to broadcast FIFA 17 Ultimate Team Championship | Daily Mail Online
text: BT Sport win rights to broadcast FIFA 17 Ultimate Team Championship Series as they look to capitalise on growing popularity of eSports BT Sport will show FIFA 17 competitive gaming on TV for the first time in the UK Rivals Sky and ITV combined with Ginx TV to launch GINX eSports TV last year Gaming is now a lucrative sport where prize money can reach seven-figure sums BT will now broadcast the showpiece FIFA 17 Ultimate Team Championship Final in Berlin on May 20 and May 21
